Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Aging

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing signage requiring lower speeds and other pedestrian-friendly actions when operators of any form of transportation are within one block of a naturally occurring retirement community or one block of a senior citizens center.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing signage requiring lower speeds and other pedestrian-friendly actions around retirement community or senior citizens center.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to demarcations at mid-block pedestrian ramps on curbs.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Improving demarcations and signage at all pedestrian crosswalks.
